item.title: 4G Wireless Quietly Encroaching on 3G
item.description:
Cellular companies are promoting 3G wireless technology as the most advanced available. However, a faster technology called 4G is being gradually introduced across the country. This situation reflects the typical progression of technology, where an invention like wireless data service undergoes continuous advancements. Like early personal computers compared to today’s models, mobile data is following a similar path of growth. Cellular carriers dominate wide-area mobile service due to their extensive network infrastructure...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/4g-wireless-quietly-encroaching-on-3g/
